member.name: T:VirtualAssistant.GitHub.Configuration.GitHubSettings
member.summary: Configuration settings for GitHub integration.

member.summary: Configuration section name in appsettings.json.

member.name: P:VirtualAssistant.GitHub.Configuration.GitHubSettings.Token
member.summary: Gets or sets the GitHub Personal Access Token (PAT). Required for API access and higher rate limits (5000 req/hour vs 60/hour).

member.name: P:VirtualAssistant.GitHub.Configuration.GitHubSettings.Owner
member.summary: Gets or sets the default GitHub owner (user or organization).

member.name: P:VirtualAssistant.GitHub.Configuration.GitHubSettings.DefaultRepo
member.summary: Gets or sets the default GitHub repository name. Used when fetching issue summaries without explicit repo specification.

member.name: P:VirtualAssistant.GitHub.Configuration.GitHubSettings.IssuesApiUrl
member.summary: Gets or sets the URL of the GitHub.Issues API for fetching Czech summaries. Example: "http://localhost:5000"

member.summary: Adds GitHub services to the service collection.

member.name: T:VirtualAssistant.GitHub.Services.GitHubIssueStatusService
member.summary: Implementation of GitHub issue status service using Octokit.NET.

member.name: T:VirtualAssistant.GitHub.Services.GitHubReferenceService
member.summary: Service for ensuring GitHub repository and issue references exist in the database.

member.name: M:VirtualAssistant.GitHub.Services.GitHubReferenceService.GitHubIssueUrlRegex
member.remarks:
Pattern:
^https?://github\\.com/(?<owner>[^/]+)/(?<repo>[^/]+)/issues/(?<number>\\d+)
Options:
RegexOptions.IgnoreCase
Explanation:
○ Match if at the beginning of the string.
○ Match a character in the set [Hh].
○ Match a character in the set [Tt] exactly 2 times.
○ Match a character in the set [Pp].
○ Match a character in the set [Ss] atomically, optionally.
○ Match the string "://".
○ Match a character in the set [Gg].
○ Match a character in the set [Ii].
○ Match a character in the set [Tt].
○ Match a character in the set [Hh].
○ Match a character in the set [Uu].
○ Match a character in the set [Bb].
○ Match '.'.
○ Match a character in the set [Cc].
○ Match a character in the set [Oo].
○ Match a character in the set [Mm].
○ Match '/'.
○ "owner" capture group.
○ Match a character other than '/' atomically at least once.
○ Match '/'.
○ "repo" capture group.
○ Match a character other than '/' atomically at least once.
○ Match '/'.
○ Match a character in the set [Ii].
○ Match a character in the set [Ss] exactly 2 times.
○ Match a character in the set [Uu].
○ Match a character in the set [Ee].
○ Match a character in the set [Ss].
○ Match '/'.
○ "number" capture group.
○ Match a Unicode digit atomically at least once.
